page.title: 11The A75 Euroroute-2
page.content:
serious structural damage to the houses along the A75. The eternal noise and dangers of the road are most distressing to the people around it too.
In some spots along the A75, it would not be uncommon to come home to find a {38 ton lorry in your garden or through {your house.}In many cases, people have been sitting quite happily watching T.V. when a lorry has suddenly ploughed through their living room wall.
{Parents}who live along the A75{dare {not let their children play outside}or cross the road perhaps to go to school themselves for fear they might get run over. Even the wind caused by the lorries could knock a child or old person off their feet. What all these
